title: Malzahar shits on nunu
body:
when you are rolling the smallest snowball ever you have to wait for his shield to be taken off and then go in there
right?
then when he sees you he does the most interactive balanced thing ever

lol you thought he would silence you while you are rolling it??

no no he will simply summon voidlings towards you.
they legit explode the snowball
they count as large monsters

rito???

replies.body: And Morde's W gives him champ heals on Malz minions. Circle of life brother.

A Wild Nunu appeared!

Go!  Voidling #362!
a champion counters the other, any problem?

Yeah, but this is just absurd.

Malz pressing W (a low-cost, low-cooldown spell) to negate the entirety of Nunu's actual ganking power is...Just not right. His W summons weak minions that die in a single champion auto, so a *single* one of them should not block the snowball.
